list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: add Glass Types CRUD page with backend model alignment
- Implement complete glass types management interface - Fix field mapping (pricePerMeter) to match backend GlassType model - Add form validation, search, and role-based permissions - Include comprehensive tests and RTL support

task.summary:
feat: initialize React frontend with Arabic-first design system
- Setup Vite + React + TypeScript project structure - Configure TailwindCSS with RTL support and Arabic fonts (Tajawal, Cairo) - Implement theme context with light/dark mode toggle - Add Axios configuration with JWT auth and token refresh - Create responsive layout with Arabic navigation - Setup project with proper TypeScript configuration and testing

feat: implement routing, authentication, and service layer
- Add comprehensive AuthContext with role-based permissions (OWNER/CASHIER/WORKER) - Implement protected routing with automatic role-based redirects - Create axios instance with JWT token management and auto-refresh - Build complete service layer for auth, invoices, customers, glass types, print jobs - Add RTL-first layout system with Arabic navigation and theme switching - Implement login page with Arabic-first design and error handling - Create role-specific dashboard with stats and quick actions - Add error boundaries and 404/unauthorized pages - Set up JSDoc type definitions for all DTOs and API responses - Configure React Query, i18n, and dayjs with Arabic locale support
Ready for Step 5: Component and page implementation

feat: implement routing, authentication, and service layer
- Add comprehensive AuthContext with role-based permissions (OWNER/CASHIER/WORKER) - Implement protected routing with automatic role-based redirects - Create axios instance with JWT token management and auto-refresh - Build complete service layer for auth, invoices, customers, glass types, print jobs - Add RTL-first layout system with Arabic navigation and theme switching - Implement login page with Arabic-first design and error handling - Create role-specific dashboard with stats and quick actions - Add error boundaries and 404/unauthorized pages - Set up JSDoc type definitions for all DTOs and API responses - Configure React Query, i18n, and dayjs with Arabic locale support
Ready for Step 5: Component and page implementation

feat: implement routing, authentication, and service layer
- Add comprehensive AuthContext with role-based permissions (OWNER/CASHIER/WORKER) - Implement protected routing with automatic role-based redirects - Create axios instance with JWT token management and auto-refresh - Build complete service layer for auth, invoices, customers, glass types, print jobs - Add RTL-first layout system with Arabic navigation and theme switching - Implement login page with Arabic-first design and error handling - Create role-specific dashboard with stats and quick actions - Add error boundaries and 404/unauthorized pages - Set up JSDoc type definitions for all DTOs and API responses - Configure React Query, i18n, and dayjs with Arabic locale support
Ready for Step 5: Component and page implementation

feat: Replace emojis with professional React Icons across all components
- Add react-icons dependency for consistent iconography - Update Sidebar with professional Feather icons (FiHome, FiFileText, etc.) - Replace emoji-based Header elements with FiMenu, FiGlobe, FiSun/FiMoon - Modernize Dashboard with role-based icons (FiCrown, FiBriefcase, FiTool) - Create professional UI component library (Button, Card, Form components) - Add comprehensive ThemeContext with light/dark/system modes - Update Error Boundary and error pages with FiAlertTriangle - Maintain all existing functionality and RTL support - Improve accessibility with proper ARIA labels and semantic icons
BREAKING CHANGE: All emoji-based UI elements replaced with React Icons

feat: add Glass Types CRUD page with backend model alignment
- Implement complete glass types management interface - Fix field mapping (pricePerMeter) to match backend GlassType model - Add form validation, search, and role-based permissions - Include comprehensive tests and RTL support
